alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 15 at 3:10AM MDT until March 16 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Periods of moderate to heavy snow expected. Additional snow accumulation after 5 AM will generally range between 5 and 10 inches. South Pass should only see another 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains. * WHEN...Now until noon MDT Thursday. The heaviest snow should occur through noon, and then again for an hour or two with frontal passage. Another bout of moderate snow is possible for the southern third of the eastern Wind River Mountains late tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult over South Pass. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
